entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.8°C

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5 except zero along parts of the coast.
